Protecting our democracy requires each of us doing our part and taking a stand against political violence. https://t.co/swRLVurNtq

1479118179339149316.text:
So, later that evening, we returned to the very Chamber that was desecrated hours earlier in the name of Trump’s falsehoods.
 
We completed our constitutional duty, and sent a clear message to all: American democracy would not succumb to the angry mob bent on ending it.

1479118176495366156.text: I shared the resolve of so many of my fellow Members who knew how important it was - not just for the American people to see, but for the entire world that was watching - that we get back to the business of certifying the election as quickly as possible.

1479118174423449614.text: Despite this incredible dereliction of leadership and the best attempts of the Trump mob, our democratic system endured.

1479118172410109957.text: We should also never forget that while innocent people feared for their lives in the Capitol, President Trump was watching gleefully from the White House dining room - apparently pleased with how his incitement was unfolding.

1479118168937295879.text: We’ll always remember the videos and pictures from that day - not just of lawmakers being hurried away to safety by Capitol Police - but of staffers huddled under desks or barricading themselves behind doors to avoid the violent mob.

1479118166630363140.text: On January 6, 2021, a violent mob, instigated by a sitting President who refused to accept the reality of his defeat, forever stained that great tradition.

1479118164256378895.text: The Congressional certification of a fair and free presidential election has been a hallmark of our democratic system from the very beginning.

1479097434437566465.text: The violent mob failed. Democracy endured. https://t.co/8fMqZAiuFQ

1462890776011186185.text: I congratulate her on nearly 50 years of public service and wish her the best in retirement.

1462890774673203206.text: I am committed to working with all of my colleagues on the Committee to carry on her example of thoughtful, bipartisan, science-driven leadership, as well as her dedication to promoting and protecting scientific research and innovation.

1462890773263826948.text: I am proud to be able to say I’ve worked with and learned from Chairwoman Johnson over the past six years.

1462890771812601856.text: She shattered barriers as the first African American and first woman to serve as Chair of @HouseScience and she’s made expanding opportunities for Americans of all backgrounds to pursue STEM opportunities a major focus of our Committee.

1462890770394927114.text: As a scientist, I especially appreciate her commitment to making sure America’s scientists are heard and given the best tools to do their jobs.

1462890769002516484.text: During her tenure as Chair, she has demonstrated a fierce commitment to protecting America’s place as the world leader in scientific research and infrastructure, and she’s done so in a bipartisan manner that should serve as an example for the entire Congress.

1350159197481168896.text: It is reassuring to have competent leadership returning to the White House. I am ready to get to work and help pass these measures through Congress without delay. (7/7)

1350159196277370887.text: Instead of being obsessed with the stock market like the outgoing President, President-elect Biden understands that building back our economy begins with small businesses that are the engines of job creation in our communities. (6/7)

1350159195027464192.text: I support President-elect Biden's plan to provide additional direct payments, extend enhanced unemployment insurance, extend the moratorium on evictions, bolster funding for childcare, and supply additional resources for small businesses. (5/7)

1350159193899229184.text: We also need to provide more relief for hardworking American families and small businesses that are still struggling to make ends meet. (4/7)

1350159192573829120.text: The American people deserve a competent strategy to get vaccines to communities across the country, and that is what President-elect Biden's plan will do. (3/7)

1350159191395213312.text: Initial vaccine distribution by the Trump administration has been disappointing and inadequate, and it's especially frustrating after scientists developed a safe and effective vaccine in record time. (2/7)

1350159189914644483.text: It's clear @JoeBiden will waste no time delivering additional crucial economic relief for the American people and launching a comprehensive plan for efficient vaccine distribution so we can finally defeat this pandemic. (1/7)
